p:
The antidepressant effect of Marze essential oil observed in our study may be related to its major component, carvacrol. The major component of Marze essential oil was carvacrol (63.34%). Falsafi et al. (2014) reported that carvacrol (45.5%) and thymol (27.9%) were the primary constituents of Marze essential oil.
14 The difference between the main components in different studies might be related to the geographic localities, harvesting time, and extraction method.
15
